briefTitle: Trial to Confirm the Clinical Efficacy and Safety of Dasiglucagon in the Treatment of Hypoglycemia in Subjects With T1DM
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Parallel-group Trial to Confirm the Clinical Efficacy and Safety of Dasiglucagon in the Rescue Treatment of Hypoglycemia in Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM) Compared to Placebo
summary: A randomized, double-blind, parallel-group trial to confirm the clinical efficacy and safety of dasiglucagon in the rescue treatment of hypoglycemia in subjects with type 1 diabetes mellitus (T1DM) compared to placebo
